policies.title: Sales Approval Policy
policies.description: Guidelines for deal approvals based on contract value
key_points: Deals under $50,000: Sales Rep can approve independently
Deals over $200,000: Requires VP Sales and Finance Director approval
All contracts must be reviewed by Legal for deals over $100,000

policies.title: Discount Authorization Policy
policies.description: Rules for offering discounts to customers
key_points: Standard discount up to 10%: Sales Rep discretion
Volume discounts have separate guidelines - see Finance team

policies.title: Contract Review Policy
policies.description: Process for contract review and approval
key_points: All non-standard contracts must be reviewed by Legal
Standard contracts can be used for deals under $50,000
Allow 2-3 business days for Legal review
Expedited review available for urgent deals (24 hours)
Red flags requiring immediate Legal consultation: liability caps, indemnification changes, IP ownership

policies.title: Customer Data Protection Policy
key_points: Never share customer data outside the company
Use only approved tools for storing customer information
All customer communications must use company email
Report any data breaches immediately to IT and Legal
